Search.Title: Batman: The Killing Joke
Search.Description: As Batman hunts for the escaped Joker, the Clown Prince of Crime attacks the Gordon family to prove a diabolical point mirroring his own fall into madness.

Search.Title: Batman: The Dark Knight Returns, Part 2
Search.Description: The Batman has returned after a 10-year absence. The Gotham authorities want to arrest him. An old foe wants a reunion. The Feds want the Man of Tomorrow to put a stop to him.

Search.Title: Batman: Mask of the Phantasm
Search.Description: Batman is wrongly implicated in a series of murders of mob bosses actually done by a new vigilante assassin.

Search.Title: Batman: Year One
Search.Description: A wealthy playboy and a Chicago cop both return to Gotham City where their lives will intersect in unexpected ways.

Search.Title: Batman: Assault on Arkham
Search.Description: Batman works desperately to find a bomb planted by the Joker while Amanda Waller hires her newly formed Suicide Squad to break into Arkham Asylum to recover vital information stolen by the Riddler.

Search.Title: Batman: The Movie
Search.Description: The Dynamic Duo faces four supervillains who plan to hold the world for ransom with the help of a secret invention that instantly dehydrates people.

Search.Title: Batman: Gotham Knight
Search.Description: A collection of key events mark Bruce Wayne's life as he journeys from beginner to Dark Knight.

Search.Title: The Lego Batman Movie
Search.Description: A cooler-than-ever Bruce Wayne must deal with the usual suspects as they plan to rule Gotham City, while discovering that he has accidentally adopted a teenage orphan who wishes to become his sidekick.

Search.Title: Batman: The Dark Knight Returns, Part 1
Search.Description: Batman has not been seen for ten years. A new breed of criminal ravages Gotham City, forcing 55-year-old Bruce Wayne back into the cape and cowl. But, does he still have what it takes to fight crime in a new era?

Search.Title: Batman: Bad Blood
Search.Description: Bruce Wayne is missing. Alfred covers for him while Nightwing and Robin patrol Gotham City in his stead. And a new player, Batwoman, investigates Batman's disappearance.
